name: fetishistic
content:
fetishistic adjective
(SHOWING INTEREST)
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing or relating to a sexual interest in an object, or in a part of the body other than the sexual organs: Both women wore fetishistic black leather. The stories are full of creepy details about her characters' fetishistic sex lives.
having so much interest in an activity or object that you spend an unreasonable amount of time thinking about it or doing it: Golfers are fetishistic about their equipment. The movie is fetishistic in its attention to period detail.
